oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Colton Greene Note
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Greene, Colton; correspondence;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Note from Alex Allison to Colton Greene: refers to cost of last years posters: $350 for 1000 small and 500 large (first edition) and $.10 apiece for 500 others (second edition); informs that present designs will require only five colors and will bring a savings of about $120; postscript asks if Greene has received New Orleans invitations sent by J. Elliot.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Allison, Alex
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
